claimReviewed: Sweet Baby Inc. Is Under Attack Due to Conservative Conspiracy Theories

itemReviewed.name: A company called Sweet Baby Inc. has become the target of 'anti-woke' gamers because it offers consultancy work, an industry-standard service that's been normal for years

reviewBody: No, PC Gamer's article is misleading. Gamers are criticizing Sweet Baby Inc for an attempt to silence, ban, and have the property seized from a gamer who published a list of games SBI had a hand in creating.
